metadata.dc:description: We conducted a meeting of experts to establish rules for the management of patients with cardiovascular devices when they require a magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) study in the most common clinical scenarios, defining whether the study is safe, unsafe or conditional.
metadata.dc:title: Normas de seguridad para el uso de resonancia magnetica en pacientes con dispositivos cardiovasculares.
[Safety standards for the use of magnetic resonance in patients with cardiovascular devices].
